resources.string: Notification body goes here! You can use any tasker variables such as %NTITLE for the notification title
This allows Pebble Notifier to forward notifications to your pebble!
This application will not work by itself until you have enabled Pebble Notifier in the Accessibility settings. Tap here to go to the Accessibility settings!
Please note that the last settings for this application was set by Tasker. Your Tasker settings will overwrite everything you set here.
If this is set, then notifications will be sent to the Pebble when the phone\'s screen is on.
If disabled Android Toasts will also be sent to your Pebble
Some older or skinned android handsets modify the notification structure. If you are not getting proper notifications or are crashing, turn this off!
Allows you to prevent any notifications from being sent from Pebble Notifier to your Pebble
Donations help development so if you like Pebble Notifier, please donate by clicking here.

Hello Pebble Notifier user,

Thank you for your curiosity. I wish I had something I could offer you for finding this message but I'm just a college student giving this app away for free. I feel like app functionality should be complete for all users and because of this I've included all of the functionality of the application to everybody, not just those who find this message. Due to these feelings this little message is pretty boring.

As a sorry for doing a lame hidden message you can email me at dattasmoon@gmail.com asking to be in the beta community. You'll be able to receive updates on upcoming features and help test my code before it goes out to the public!

Thank you for using my application,
-Dattas Moonchaser
Android notifications that have the ongoing flag set are not sent to your Pebble
I want this setting to change
Convert characters or text that are unsupported on the Pebble watch to readable characters before sending
List of words or regular expressions where if it matches, it will not send the notification to your Pebble
Are you sure you want to uncheck all of the boxes below?
